Tray bakesğŸŒ° Fruit oat and seeds bar 70g light muscovado 2 tbsp golden syrup 70g butter 250g oats 85g walnut pieces 50g seeds 25g cranberries 50g apricot 85g sultanas/raisins Preheat oven to 160*C. Heat sugar, butter and golden syrup in a pan. When melted, stir in the other ingredients. Press into a lined 23cmx23cm tin. Roll a tin can over the top (with baking paper) to pack down.
